title: radiohead / in rainbows / front cover type / ???
content:
anyone know what type radiohead used for the front of in rainbows? they used din here and there on the back and with lyrics, etc, but the front is definitely a different typeface. anyone?

take a look if you don't have it.  
 [http://991.com/newGallery/Radiohead-In-Rainbows-421971.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20111228174032/http:/991.com/newGallery/Radiohead-In-Rainbows-421971.jpg "http://991.com/newGallery/Radiohead-In-Rainbows-421971.jpg")

then go buy it if you don't have it.

thanks
author: aust.taylor

comments.content: Real close to Franklin Gothic, but I'm not sure.
[Benton Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20111228174032/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/benton_sans_medium/?acs_p=1) is as close as I can find, still not it though.

I heard someone said it was [Transport Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20111228174032/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/transport_medium/?sample_text=IN%20RAINBOWS%2F&sample_size=48).  
Indeed, it is similar.
